products.title: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: The mayfair cream dimout perfect fit offers unbridled elegance in an easy-fit form. Rather than installing onto the wall, the blind clips to your actual window frame, for a flush fit that integrates seamlessly into your window. When closed the pleated style means the honeycomb fabric cascades down the glass, as well as offering thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. A milky cream tone creates a delicate neutral, which would pair well with more traditional interiors and antique furnishings.

products.title: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Experience premium shading in its simplest possible form with the mayfair ivory dimout perfect fit. This blind clips onto your actual window frame, the brackets sliding in to lock onto your window without need of drilling or tools. The pleated style creates an attractive texture in your window frame, rippling down the glass when closed, and additionally provides thermal benefits to help regulate temperature.

products.title: Eggshell Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required no drills necessary with their revolutionary clip-on perfect fit blinds in eggshell.

products.title: Pearl Honeycomb Blackout Perfect Fit
products.description: Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required all of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms.

products.title: Double Cream Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Rigid aluminium slats are beautifully showcased in double cream gloss, a soft and sumptuous hue with a high-beam shine. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Real Wood Grey Pearl Perfect Fit
products.description: The neutral hue of grey pearl pairs beautifully with all colours, making a stylish yet safe choice for the home. Grey can be used to cool vibrant colours or to give a touch of contrast to other neutral tones. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Delicate Cream Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Their delicate cream satin slat offers a softer take on pure white, with a shimmering mid-gloss for a pearlescent effect. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this hampton dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows.

products.title: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create elegant shading in your window with the kingston cream pleated perfect fit. The game-changing blind style fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for a simple tools-free installation system. Colour match your perfect fit frame to your upvc window for an integrated, cohesive look. The cream hue has a classic elegance that's well suited to traditional interiors.
